(OK this has to take place before HotRod gets out of the CR)


::Feline::
She got out of the CR chamber and walked to her work bench.  She 
opened her left forarm panel and installed the small control board 
for her chips.  She had one in HotRod, one in Battera.  She had only 
one chip left to install.  She picked up the chip and put in her arm 
with the panel.  She then closed her arm panel and smiled.  She could 
now control the other bots and not lose the controls.  She started 
working on a plan to get HotRod and Battera over to Zardus.  She knew 
she had to create a diversion to get them all out and with minimal 
damage.  She didn't want to hand damaged goods over to Zardus.  She 
opened her link, "Battera, could you come to the lab please?"
She smiled.

Battera::
She walked down the hall and to the lab,"Yes, you called for me?"

Feline:: She opened her arm panel and activated the ship inside 
Battera.

Battera::
She felt a surge of information flood her mind. She fell to the round 
shaking and then stood up as the chip took control of her.  She 
looked at Feline. "What is it that you want?" she said in a rather 
rough voice.

Feline::
She smiled and walked up close to Battera.  SHe whispered into 
Battera's ear,"I want you to go to the Allience base and tell Zardus 
that you now serve him and that I will be going back to the base 
soon. You are to follow and obey Zardus now. Got it?"

Battera::
She smiled evilly and looked at Feline, "Yes, right away."
She then walked out of the lab.  She headed to the entrance and 
stepped outside of the base.  She transformed into her bat mode and 
took off towards the sky.  She had the distict feeling like she was 
finally finding her place. 

(The chip mostly changes the nature of the bot from maximal to 
Predacon.  All personallity chances from good natured to evil.  And 
makes the bot prone to obeying who ever installed the chip. But it 
doesn't make them slaves completely)
